Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm grounded a ball to shortstop to drive in Anthony Volpe for the winning run in a 4-3 walk-off victory.
Luis Gil delivered a strong performance, allowing just one earned run over five innings and striking out five batters.
Juan Soto hit a two-run homer in the sixth inning, breaking his cold streak.
Austin Wells hit a sacrifice fly to left field in the bottom of the 10th inning, driving in Volpe to tie the game at 3-3.
Post-Match Reflections: Jazz Chisholm expressed excitement about the playoff atmosphere, saying, 'We got a strikeout to end the 8th inning and the whole crowd erupted and I was just wide-eyed and was like ‘this is sick’. It ain’t even October yet, I can’t wait.'
